article_title: Georgette Braun: Donald Trump, Ted Cruz, Metallica fuse in Rockford writer's head

article_metadata.description: Nearly 20 years ago, I arrived early at Winnebago County Fairgrounds in Pecatonica to write about the Metallica concert about to be held there that night.I was glad I did, because cars were backed up for miles along U.S. 20 trying to get into too few entrances. Hundreds of fans abandoned their vehicles and hoofed it to get to the fairgrounds to hear the heavy metal band. I called in my story to an editor; it was in the days before smartphones, Twitter, Facebook and instant messaging.The Donald
article_metadata.author: Georgette Braun
